page.title: 16Religion_ Hindu Samaj Mandal
page.content: The West Midlands is an area with a rich mixture of cultures and religions. Within a few miles of each other, the visitor can see a variety of places of worship, including those of Hindu, Sikh, and Muslim faiths as well as many Christian Churches. Hindu Samaj Mandal in Salisbury Street was dedicated in June 1985. This marked another step in the progress of the temple, which began in a semi_detached house in 1972. The present building is very extensive and has been carefully converted to serve the needs of the local Hindu population. Two acts of worship are performed each day. Sunday is regarded as the most holy day of the week. The temple has facilities for weddings, and festivals are celebrated throughout the year.
